review_data.title: Great experience!
review_data.content: The food tastes great at this place! Very authentic food made with passion and care. The service is very good and the owner is extremely friendly! I highly recommend it.

review_data.title: Tasty & fresh
review_data.content: Never ever miss this restaurant if you are visting Zurich. I have been there on my last day in Switzerland in the last vacation. The food is tasty & fresh . The staff are very kind & helpful & it is cheap.. hopefully to see...More

review_data.title: Too good
review_data.content: Its our go to spot whenever we crave mughlai food. The curries are ome of the best in town. Hands down the best take away joint for mughlai food.

review_data.title: Cheap and delicious Indian food

review_data.title: Super leckeres Essen

review_data.title: Best Pakistani Restaurant at Zurich
review_data.content: One of the Halal Restaurant we visited during our stay at Zurich. Best and friendly Khan (Chef) and his friend. Serving is big, best Lamb Bryani I recommend, the Tea Ginger Chai is power in the cold winter weather. Near tram station.

review_data.title: Best value for money Indian food in Zurich so far
review_data.content: This is a very small take away restaurant with very few seats (near to Lindenplatz, Altstetten). Eventhough I work in Altstetten for last 5 years I never noticed this place until one of my colleague told me recently. Its a bit difficult to find as...More

review_data.title: Lovely experience
review_data.content: Nice food and staff.. Had a great time.. Recommended to all.. Rice and chicken was awsum.. Pakistani taste.. Friendly staff.. Easy accessable location by bus.. Value for money.. Must visit..

review_data.title: Good indian food
review_data.content: In general it is moderately good with reasonable prices and delicious food... I went there twice with my friends and it was nice

review_data.title: Favourite with South Asian and Locals alike
review_data.content: This is a favourite joint for a lot of office going crowd for lunch. The prices are very reasonable and the portion are very generous. The owner is super nice. Food is always fresh and tasty. They have large containers ready with various dishes. You...More

review_data.title: Good food more important its halal and value for money
review_data.content: Excellent food owner mr Akmal and Nadeem very good person value for money in meal quantity of food is good enough, its very hard to find halal food in zurich but this is the best place for pakistan and indian food

review_data.title: Excellent Food and price is budget friendly !!
review_data.content: Hi Everyone, Me and my husband have biryani at curry queen almost every week. They serve excellent Lamb Biryani on Wednesdays and Chicken Biryani on Fridays. Meat is really well cooked and the masalas are exact and never too spicy. The owner of this restaurant...More

review_data.title: Very good food at affordable price..also for vegetarians

review_data.title: Best Indian restaurant / take away in Zürich!

review_data.title: Well priced good food
review_data.content: The food was really good, the price was better than other places and the owner was very welcoming. The best way to get there from the main station is by tram number 2.

review_data.title: excellent halal pakistani take away
review_data.content: we had there lunch with our kids (6 small seats). my son was served twice (hungry teenager). we had a menu, mango lassi, samosa and chai each for chfr 84. all home made food, very delicious! we ll certainly return!
